instructions: Connect your iPhone and your HTC phone to your computer. In HTC Sync Manager , click Home > Transfer & Backup . Click the Get Started button. If you haven't used iTunes to back up your iPhone content to your computer, please do so before proceeding. Select your iPhone backup file, and then click OK . Select the types of content you want to transfer to your HTC phone. You can choose whether to replace the content on your HTC phone with the iPhone content. Click Start . Wait for HTC Sync Manager to finish transferring content.
